titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (REFERRING ORGANISATION) - Description

body.p: CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (REFERRING ORGANISATION) is the same as attribute COMMUNICATION CONTACT STRING where the COMMUNICATION CONTACT METHOD is National Code 'UK Telephone Number'.
CONTACT TELEPHONE NUMBER (REFERRING ORGANISATION) is the telephone number for a PERSON who is the designated contact of the referring ORGANISATION .
